taskGroup.name: Generating jobs with Rapid Generator
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the process of generating DataStage jobs from a physical data model.
Note: This cheat sheet assumes that you completed all the tasks in the cheat sheet "Importing logical tables from SAP with Rapid Modeler".
taskGroup.onCompletion: You have now generated jobs that extract logical tables from SAP and save them into a database.

task.name: Preparing a logical data model for job generation
task.intro: This task shows how to transform a logical data model with metadata imported by Rapid Modeler into a phyiscal data model that can be used with job generation.

task.name: Creating a Rapid Generator configuration
task.intro: This cheat sheet shows you how to create a Rapid Generator configuration.

task.name: Generating DataStage jobs using Rapid Generator
task.intro: This cheat sheet shows you how to generate jobs from a physical data model.
